info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: performs differential gene expression tests based on count tables
info.paperDescription: Differential gene expression analysis was performed using %method% (%SOFTWARE_VERSION%).
info.dependencies: packages: edgeR, DESeq, DESeq2, limma, Biobase, RColorBrewer, gplots, getopt, genefilter, lattice

param.name: countFile
param.description: count file with features in rows and samples in columns

param.name: sampleAnnotation
param.description: annotation file with sample names in the first colum and sample condition in the second condition; (header: sample\tcondition)

param.name: featureAnnotation
param.description: annotation file which is joined with the count file

param.name: featureAnnotationID
param.description: name of the column used for joining

param.name: featureAnnotationType
param.description: name of the column in the annotation file for which a distribution plot is created

param.name: excludeSamples
param.description: names of samples that should be excluded from the analysis

param.name: minKeepReads
param.description: number of reads a feature must own in average per sample to pass filtering step before DE test is performed

param.name: foldchangeCutoff
param.description: log2 foldchange cutoffs for which a own result file will be created; will be used for both directions (+/-)

param.name: foldchangeCutoffNames
param.description: corresponding names to the foldchange cutoffs

param.name: method
param.description: method that should be applied; one of: limma, DESeq, DESeq2, edgeR, all
